actionConfiguration.body:
from(bucket: "LibreInventoryTransactions")
  |> range(start: -1000d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "inventoryTransaction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["storageLocation.name"] == "MEL/ADYLIVE/A010")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["material.code", "status.code", "carrier.id", "storageLocation.name", "quantity"])
  |> group(columns: ["material.code", "status.code", "carrier.id", "storageLocation.name"], mode:"by")
  |> sum(column: "quantity")
